overview: A new full-length rock climbing film from directors Andrew Kornylak and Josh Fowler, A Fine Line follows one season with some of the world's most visionary climbers as they pursue the best - and worst - rock in America, from Alpine Colorado to remote Idaho and the Deep South. Featuring Jimmy Webb, Brion Voges, Dave Graham, Daniel Woods, Peter Beal, and other top climbers, A Fine Line is a beautiful visual meditation on the bouldering lifestyle.
title: A Fine Line
